summary: Frozen Christmas is a new greatsword that i created especially for Christmas(Obviously)!The greatsword use the same meshes/textures of the Stalhrim Greatsword, if you use any mod that change meshes/textures, them FC will change too!
descriptionHtml:
Frozen Christmas can be found on "Birna's Oddments" in Winterhold.
The blade has 1000 Charges, using 10 each use, results in 100 uses.
Two-handed
Base Damage: 25
Weight: 19
Reach: 1.4
Speed: 0.75
Stagger: 1.3
Base Value: 3500
Enchantment:
Frost Damage: 25
Chance do paralyze for 3 seconds

This is the first weapon mod i created, then here it is!

(Any mod that changes "Birna's Oddments" will be "incompatible")
author: KNightmare Projects
